name: BOTW Text Edition.
description:
BOTW in Text Form (Very Early)

I'm trying to recreate BOTW in its simplest form a Text Based Adventure, Right now only the intro is (Kind Of) complete I intend to actually add the tutorial parts of the game, This is a very early alpha and is my first time coding without Unity. I will update as often as I can however, I have school so if progress is slow I'm sorry, I will upload raw game code if wanted on GitHub or something although its mostly just If Statements and printf and scanf_s.
